Title: anti-Taiwanese contacts poster
Publisher: Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局)
Notes: From a set of six posters, published by the Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局), warning against listening to Taiwanese propaganda.The text reads "'Heart War' items found floating in the air by the Taiwan authorities should be turned over immediately. Anyone who uses, disseminates or diffuses it shall be punished by law."The text on the balloon reads "air balloon".
